title: Facebook-Based Intercultural Collaborative Learning: Global Practitioner Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: In-service professionals performing cross-cultural collaboration projects in mobile environments, utilizing Facebook as the primary communication tool

learning_goals: Learners can perform three or more cross-cultural collaboration activities via a Facebook group and specifically explain real-time communication strategies with multicultural team members.
Learners can maintain at least five international professional connections through Facebook networks for two months post-project and present cases of practical application.
Learners can submit a report demonstrating a 30%+ improvement in information-sharing efficiency by integrating Web 2.0 tools (e.g., Google Drive, Padlet) into Facebook collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
